modName: Revealing Dawnguard Male Armors and clothes - retextured
summary: Dawnguard armors and clothes, for male, retextured to be skimpier
descriptionHtml:
=======Description============================
This is a retexture of dawnguard armors and clothes to be skimpier
I use favoredsoul meshes for male body (there no sos version).

Install
======
Download this file and unpack it to your Skyrim data folder, it will overwrite existing files.
or use NMM.

Known Issues
============
- some clipping issues (I only use Nifskope, I don't know how to use blender or other one to correct that, if somebody knows, it is up to him to use my work to improve it)

Credit
============
favoressoul and chris57 for male body.
aoki for his first version of dawnguard armor.

Excuse my english, French people doesn't speak other language very well...
author: kentin15
